title: Expect Higher Prices Everywhere on Your Spring Road Trip
sub_head: Gas, food and lodging could all feel more expensive due to inflation and other factors
body:
Faced with the surging cost of road travel, some travelers are re-evaluating their plans and might cancel trips.
Others say they are hitting the road anyway. With Covid-19 cases declining across the country, these travelers say they are eager to get out for spring and summer trips. They plan to forge ahead but make some spending adjustments.
